00029 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00030     public:
00031         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00032                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00033                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00034                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00035         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00036 
00037         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00038                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00039                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00040         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00041         virtual void Draw (void);
00042 
00043         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00044                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00045                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00046 
00047     protected:
00048         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00049 
00050         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00051         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00052         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00053 
00054         virtual void Initialize (void);
00055         virtual void InitMem (void);
00056 
00057         vec4vec3D X,      
00058         Xtrans; 
00059         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00060 
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00064 /*******************************************************************************
00065  *
00066  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00067  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00068  *  but need not
00069  */
00070 
00072 
00074 
00082 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00083     public:
00084         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00085                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00086                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00087                      double _rad = 1);
00088         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00089         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0,
00090                                     double = 0) { Radius = _a; }
00091 
00092     protected:
00093         virtual function_type f;
00094         virtual function_type normal;
00095 
00096         double Radius;
00097 };

00107 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00108     public:
00109         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00110                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00111                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00112                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00113         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00114         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00115                                     double _c = 0, double = 0) {
00116                                         R = _a; r = _b; rho = _c; }
00117 
00118     protected:
00119         virtual function_type f;
00120 
00121         double R, r, rho;
00122 };

00174 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00175     public:
00176         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00177                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00178                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00179                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00180         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00181         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00182             M = _a; R = _b;
00183         }
00184 
00185     protected:
00186         virtual function_type f;
00187 
00188         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00189         R;
00190 };
